org.princehouse.mica.base.simple
Class SimpleRuntime<P extends Protocol>

java.lang.Object
  org.princehouse.mica.base.model.Runtime<P>
      org.princehouse.mica.base.simple.SimpleRuntime<P>
All Implemented Interfaces:
AcceptConnectionHandler
public class SimpleRuntime<P extends Protocol>
extends Runtime<P>
implements AcceptConnectionHandler

Basic Runtime implementation. Nothing fancy: It just serializes and exchanges complete node state.
